metadata.title: CVE-2019-5833 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect dialog box scoping in browser in Google Chrome on Android priorto 75.0.3770.80 allowed a remote attacker to display misleading security UIvia a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
